title: Week 14 Strategy + Buy or Sell, Catch the Fire - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/8
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode heading into Week 14! On today’s fantasy football podcast, tough start / sit decisions for Week 14, and roster strategies with the fantasy playoffs around the corner! Plus, rest of season outlooks, injury updates, and a preview of the Thursday Night matchup between the Steelers and Vikings. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 8th, 2021.
  
 (05:45) - Buy or Sell
 (14:10) - News & Notes
 (20:30) - Mailbag
 (21:40) - Insurance RBs vs Bench Depth
 (24:40) - Taysom Hill or Lamar Jackson
 (27:55) - League of Record Updates
 (32:10) - Start Terry McLaurin?
 (36:40) - Kareem Hunt or Tony Pollard?
 (39:00) - Elijah Moore or Hollywood Brown rest of season?
 (41:05) - Thursday Night Breakdown - Steelers at Vikings
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
